resources.string: Subscriptions are recurring. You will be automatically be billed through your Google Play Store Account, Your subscription will auto-renew unless you cancel. You can manage your subscription in the settings in the Google Play Store

Unlock full access to all the features on Tripreview with our exclusive subscription. Offering an entire year of unlimited service for just $1, this subscription ensures you get the most out of our platform. Please explore the details and take advantage of this incredible value.
Unlock all the services on Tripreview by redeeming your points. Enjoy seamless access to everything we have to offer, all with the convenience of using your earned points.

We are excited to introduce a point system that allows you to earn points by interacting with our community. Here's how you can earn points:

1. Follow Other Users: +1 Point

By following other users, you can stay connected with like-minded people, discover new content, and earn 1 point for each new user you follow!

2. Post Content: +5 Points

Sharing your thoughts, travels? Each time you post content on our platform, you'll earn 5 points. We value your contributions, and these points reflect our appreciation for your active participation.
